'''19w14b''' is the thirty-second and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on April 5, 2019<ref name=19w14b>{{snap|19w14b|id=a0|April 4, 2019}}</ref>, which fixes bugs from the previous snapshots.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
[[File:Suspicious Stew JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] '''[[Suspicious Stew]]'''
* Suspicious stew with saturation now lasts 0.35 seconds instead of 5 seconds.
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Sneaking]] and [[Crawling|Suffocation Prevention]]'''
* Now only checks the top half of the player when deciding what model to use, instead of also the feet, to fix bugs relating to doors, falling sand, etc.

=== General ===
'''Performance'''
* Improved performance.
